snippet.title: Exotic Matter Early Access Trailer | Release 7-6-2018
snippet.description:
Exotic Matter is an upcoming sandbox Metroidvania for PC that leaves you crashed on an alien planet. 

Explore the open-world of planet Xcylin and dive deep into the underground facilities of an extinct race. Discover countless items, weapons and block types to help you reach your ultimate goal: to get back to earth and save all humanity in the process.

Releasing on Steam Early Access on July 6th 2018

Music by David Levy
